title: Animal life
brief_description: A review of the main types of animal - protozoans, sponges, colelenterates, echinoderms, worms, molluscs, crustaceans, insects, and vertebrates. There is also a description of animal functions - locomotion, food intake, digestion, waste disposal, respiration, and nervous system activity.
